src:
六合彩頭獎1.4億元今晚攪珠！買電腦飛易中獎！3個特旺號碼
07 Nov 2019, 10:00 by 熱話
【六合彩1.4億元頭獎】上期六合彩金多寶的9,000萬頭獎無人中，獎金將撥入下期攪珠，馬會今晚（7日）攪珠，馬會估計一注10元獨中頭獎可獲1.4億元獎金。根據馬會資料顯示，過去8年彩池逾1億港元並有人中頭獎的六合彩中，有2/3的頭獎彩票都是「電腦飛」。
撰文：SmartED編輯部 | 圖片：新傳媒資料室、香港賽馬會
1億六合彩攪珠旺門號碼
至於歷來六合彩最高的頭獎獎金，是2013年12月10日的攪珠，該期頭獎一注中，頭獎獎金為$90,951,590，但從來沒有幸運兒可以一注獨中1億六合彩頭獎。相信市民都很想知道哪些號碼是大熱門，而過往11次的1億元或以上頭獎彩金攪珠中，有三個號碼就各自被攪出過4次，其中兩個號碼甚至有3次有一齊出現！這三個幸運號碼就是「32」、「43」及「49」號，另外40號也被攪出3次。
相關文章：六合彩萬聖節金多寶冇人中！下期頭獎達9,000萬元！近期3個號碼勁旺


香港賽馬會特別把原定明（5日）晚攪珠，順延至周四（7日）晚上9時半舉行，截止投注時間為當晚9時15分。

1億六合彩揀4字頭的大冧巴
值得留意的，這11次攪珠中，當中有9次都見到「4字頭」的「大冧巴」，即40至49號老是常出現。但不少市民都有特定的投注心水組合，如「生日組合」等，但這些都是細號碼（1至31號以內），所以如果全部投注細號碼，很大機會就錯失頭獎了。



歷來億元六合彩頭獎攪珠結果

資料來源：香港賽馬會
相關文章：六合彩萬聖節金多寶 頭獎達8,000萬 「2X」係歷屆最旺幸運號碼
香港賽馬會最旺投注站？
六合彩猶如一場幸運賭博，除了參考熱門號碼外，有不少市民都會到運氣較旺的投注站碰碰運氣。翻查馬會的資料，發現過往8次1億六合彩攪珠中，最幸運的億元六合彩投注站，就是北角馬寶道投注站。2011年5月20日的1.33億元六合彩派彩，頭獎由3注瓜分，各派逾4,400萬元，當中有2注頭獎的彩票都是由北角馬寶道投注站售出，分別是一張自選單式彩票和一張電腦單式彩票。這8次1億六合彩中，一共有15個投注站瓜分頭獎，其中大部份位於九龍西及新界西投注站，包括土瓜灣道、石硤尾偉智街、尖沙咀漢口道、尖沙咀東、屯門市廣場、美孚麗灣道、葵涌榮芳路、青衣城及天水圍銀座等。


攪珠日期
歷來億元六合彩頭獎中獎投注站、渠道

資料來源：香港賽馬會
中六合彩頭獎次數統計
除了1億六合彩熱門投注站外，以平常中六合彩頭獎次數統計，中環士丹利街投注站可以說最旺，因為由1994年到2019年2月16日，中環士丹利街投注站一共有47次中六合彩頭獎，其次是屯門市廣場和荃灣青山道。
十大幸運投注處

資料來源：香港賽馬會
六合彩熱門投注站：漢口道、好運中心
看來，無論是億元六合彩，還是平常派彩，尖沙咀漢口道及沙田好運中心都是中頭獎的超級幸運投注站！相信當日會有大批市民都會去這些熱門投注站，為了避免大排長龍，以錯失截止投注時間，應該早些到投注站。而一眾打工仔怕收工之後趕不切，記得早一日就投注。

text:
Liuhe Caitou Prize of 140 million yuan tonight! Buy a computer fly easy to win! 3 Tewang numbers
07 Nov 2019, 10:00 by hot words
[6-color lottery 140 million yuan first prize] In the last issue of Liuhe Caijin Duobao's 90 million prizes, the prize will be transferred to the next season, the Jockey Club will be tonight (7th), the Jockey Club will estimate a 10 yuan single prize. Can receive a bonus of 140 million yuan. According to the information of the Jockey Club, 2/3 of the lottery tickets in the past eight years with more than HK$100 million in prize pools and some of them are "computer flying".
Written by: SmartED Editorial Department | Photo: New Media Reference Room, Hong Kong Jockey Club
100 million six color stitching beads Wangmen number
As for the highest first prize in the Mark Six lottery, it was the beating on December 10, 2013. In the first prize of the first prize, the jackpot prize was $90,951,590, but no lucky one could ever win the 100 million prize. I believe that the public would like to know which numbers are hot, and in the past 11 times, the top prizes of 100 million yuan or more were mixed up four times, and two of them were even 3 times. Come together! The three lucky numbers are "32", "43" and "49", and the 40th is also stirred up three times.
Related article: Liuhecai Halloween Jin Duobao! The next prize is worth 90 million yuan! Recent 3 numbers


The Hong Kong Jockey Club specially smashed the original scheduled (5th) night, which was postponed until 9:30 pm on Thursday (7th), and the betting time was 9:15 that evening.

100 million color picking 4 head of the big bar
It is worth noting that among the 11 times of the Beating Balls, 9 of them have seen the "Big Head" of the "4 heads", that is, the 40 to 49 are always appearing. However, many people have specific betting combinations, such as "birthday combinations", but these are fine numbers (within 1 to 31), so if you place a fine number, you will miss the jackpot.

Hong Kong Jockey Club's most popular betting station?
The six-color lottery is like a lucky gamble. In addition to the reference to popular numbers, many people will try their luck at the luckier betting stations. Looking at the information of the Jockey Club, I found that the luckiest 100-odd lottery betting station in the past eight hundred million matches was the Marlboro betting station in North Point. The 133 million yuan lottery lottery on May 20, 2011, the first prize was divided by 3 notes, each with more than 44 million yuan. Among them, 2 lottery tickets were sold by the Marlboro betting station in North Point. Optional lottery ticket and a computer single lottery. A total of 15 betting stations, including the To Kwa Wan Road, Shek Kip Mei Wai Chi Street, Shek Kip Mei Estate, Tsim Sha Tsui, and Tsim Sha Tsui East. Tuen Mun Town Square, Mei Fung Lai Wan Road, Kwai Chung Wing Fung Road, Tsing Yi Estate and Tin Shui Wai Ginza.

Mark Six Lottery Betting Station: Hankou Road, Good Luck Center
It seems that whether it is a 100-pound lottery or a usual payout, the Hankow Road and Sha Tin Good Luck Centres in Tsim Sha Tsui are the super lucky betting stations in the jackpot! I believe that a large number of people will go to these popular betting stations on the same day. In order to avoid long queues, it is necessary to go to the betting station earlier. And a lot of wage earners are afraid of catching up after the work, remember to bet on the early day.
